meanings.definition: In a greedy manner; with excessive desire for more than one needs or deserves.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel greedily hoarded nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent2: She greedily devoured the entire chocolate cake in one sitting.
meanings.sent3: The child greedily grabbed all the toys, not leaving any for his friends.
meanings.sent4: The company greedily exploited its workers for maximum profit.
meanings.sent5: The hungry dog greedily licked its empty food bowl, hoping for more.
